name: Atomic L2 cross-chain communication with L1Call
description: Atomic multi-chain dapps can be created with the usage of new precompiles: L1CALL and L1DELEGATECALL. This talk will go over how we could utilize these new precompiles on an L2 along with proxy contracts to unlock horizontal scaling for dapps on L2.

speakers.name: David Weisiger
speakers.bio: Head of DevRel at Taiko Labs
